name: Reshape (Total Involve)
description:
Change your shape to match the enemy at any time in this arcade top-down shooter.

Unlock powerful weapons and upgrades over the course of your playthrough but be careful because if you get hit even once, the game will be over.

Features

  • Fight through endless waves of enemies to beat your high score.
  • Defeat bigger enemies to unlock 8 different weapons and then upgrade each of them several times.
  • Switch between squares, circles and triangles to deal damage to a specified enemy.

Controls

  • WASD Keys for movement.
  • Mouse cursor to aim.
  • Space bar to change shape.
  • Left click to shoot.
  • Escape to pause.

(no controller support)
